attributes.contentHtml:
Error404 Woah there bud, those are some big scary words "Lawsuit". It seems like you're just trying to cover up your tracks but failed. A lawsuit for DM advertising on Discord is the biggest joke I've heard today. You got all your customers through DM advertising, and you got exposed for it, so that's why you're making a big deal out of it?

I never said that using a template was an issue, so why you trying concentrate on that instead of all the other things like discord billing?

The biggest problem here Error404 or should I say TechZack... is that you still won't admit to DM advertising. Yeah, I know it's you TechZack behind that 404error account. You're just simply trying to avoid and dissolve the responsibility by acting we didn't know it was your doing. Stop using "The CEO" and "them", we know it's you TechZack.

attributes.title: TZSolutions | Everything on site links to Discord, Billing on Discord, DM Advert
